column4: is anyone else having problems with using amsn from hardy? .. mine no longer connects anymore on two machines
and if i update amsn from svn.. it then works.. so im presuming there should be some kind of update released
as updating from svn is annoying.. i'd rather just click the update button ;)
hmm.. maybe i should check the bugzilla
amsn is actually a better msn client than pidgin.. imho
but obviously pidgin supports other protocols
amsn can be a little buggy i find
i always liked it but recent versions are a little dodgy personally (since they added webcam, audiochat etc)
what is your problem with amsn?
what version of amsn are you on? there's a version in -proposed which might fix your problem
on a much more productive note. have you tried the version in hardy-proposed (0.97+final-0ubuntu5.1)
no i havnt.. i have only compiled amsn from svn (made a .deb package) and installed that
oh... well wth are you complaining about then if it works?
because i had to compile it from svn.. instead of receive an update ;)
debian has testing and unstable versions instead
